title: Walter Quispe Vargas
text:
Soy investigador, científico de datos y docente universitario en las areas de Matemática, Estadística y Ciencias de la Computación.



Ph.D. Computing and Information Science, 2019,  Universidad de Puerto Rico Recinto de Mayaguez, USA.
M.Sc. Mathematics and Statistics, 2006,  Universidad of Puerto Rico Recinto de Mayaguez, USA.
B.Sc. Mathematics and Statistics, 2001,  Universidad San Antonio Abad del Cusco, Perú.





Apr 2023 - Present, Full Time Adjunt Professor

San Antonio Abad University, Cusco, Perú

Sep 2021 - Aug 2023, Quantitative Risk Analyst.

Model Risk Management at First Bank of Puerto Rico.

Sep 2020 - Sep 2021, Data Scientist.

Artificial Intelligence at Banco Popular de Puerto Rico.

Jan 2020 - Sep 2020, Data Science Post Doctoral Research.

University of Puerto Rico at Mayaguez, USA.

Jan 2013 - Dic 2019, Teaching and Research Assistant.

University of Puerto Rico at Mayaguez, USA.

Aug 2007 - Dic 2012, Assistant Professor.

University of Puerto Rico at Rio Piedras, USA.

Aug 2006 - Aug 2007, Assistant Professor.

University of Puerto Rico at Utuado, USA.





Machine Learning, Bayesian Statistics, Model Risk Management.

title: Walter Quispe Vargas
text:
DATA SCIENTIST & QUANTITATIVE ANALYST

I’m scientific developer, real-world practitioner focusing on Statistics, Data Analysis and Machine Learning.
I’m aiming to deploy my professional knowledge in academia and industry to perform data-driven discovery and decision making process.
I enjoy making research and develop tools for data science model life cycle.
I studied Computing and Information Science, finishing my PhD in 2019, I worked in academia (teaching and doing research) and in banking industry (model risk management). I usually use R, Python and SQL to develop models.
